bio.p: Luca Chiovato obtained his M.D. degree at the University of Pisa in 1976. He completed his postgraduate Degree in Internal Medicine in 1982 and obtained his PhD in Endocrine and Metabolic Sciences at University of Florence in 1988. At present his position is: Full Professor of Endocrinology at University of Pavia, director of the Internal Medicine and Therapeutics department of the University of Pavia, Director of the Laboratory for Endocrine Disruptors and Director of the Head Unit of Internal Medicine and Endocrinology, ICS Maugeri SpA â€“I.R.C.C.S, Pavia. His main research fields are: endocrine autoimmunity; thyroid diseases, genetics and clinics of obesity; endocrine disruptors.
